name: Link Spammer
text:
2 Monsters
If a monster is Summoned to a zone this card points to you can Special Summon a monster from your deck with the same level as that monster but a different name. You can only use this effect of "Link Spammer" once per turn. If you Link Summon a monster using this card as a material: Special Summon this card to a zone that monster points to.
